tool_description:
LoginRadius is one simplified API for 30 popular ID providers such as Facebook, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn, Amazon, etc.

LoginRadius’ unified API, websites can quickly integrate multiple social networks and no need to worry about the maintenance and changes with provider’s API.

LoginRadius’ technology has made it possible to aggregate the data sets and unify the protocols (OpenID and oAuth) into one API.
name: loginradius
title: loginradius

api_list.name: Status Update
api_list.description: Status Update - API help Endpoint	https://hub.loginradius.com/status/help

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: User profile session Token (to): [optional parameter] if you want to  post status on a particular user wall then just pass member id in to it work only in Facebook

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: url:- [optional parameter] any url that you want post in status message

optional_parameters.name: imageurl
optional_parameters.description: imageurl :- [optional parameter] any image url that you want post in status message

optional_parameters.name: caption
optional_parameters.description: caption : [optional parameter] caption that you want post in status message

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: description :- [optional parameter] description  that you want post in status message

api_list.name: Direct Message API
api_list.description: Direct Message API - API help Endpoint	https://hub.loginradius.com/directmessage/help
